name: Ainsworth King Spin Slots
description:
Share in the King sized fun of the all new Ainsworth King Spin Slots. The very latest in casino slot games comes to your mobile device!

All new PAC-MAN Wild Edition Slots now available.

With stunning titles like RUMBLE RUMBLE, BIG BANG BUCKS and WILDFIRE RICHES, it's a slot game experience like no other. Play for jackpots, including the sensational platinum mega jackpot!

Claim free coins without having to wait hours. Play every day for regular bonuses.

Play these popular Ainsworth slot games now!

- RICH N WILD (NEW!)
- MOTZA MAGIC (NEW!)
- FLYING HORSE
- RUMBLE RUMBLE
- PURE PLATINUM
- MAYAN GOLD
- BIG BANG BUCKS
- KING CAT

More amazing Ainsworth games will come in future regular updates.

This product is intended for use by those 21 or older for amusement purposes only. Malfunction voids all pays and plays.

*In app purchases are available to accelerate game progression. Free coins can be claimed 24/7 or they can accumulate to a maximum level and be claimed. Games available subject to change without notice. Player accounts can not be bought/sold or otherwise transferred.
